description: Fetch and parse entries from RSS/Atom feeds.

rss_url.info: URL of the RSS or Atom feed to fetch entries from.

max_entries.info: Maximum number of RSS entries to return (1-100).

days_back.info: Only include entries from the last N days. Set to 0 to include all entries.

include_summary.info: Whether to include the entry summary/description in the results.

include_content.info: Whether to include the full entry content in the results (if available).

parse_dates.info: Whether to parse and include formatted datetime fields.

sort_order.info: How to sort the RSS entries: newest first, oldest first, or keep feed order.

user_agent.info: User agent string to use when fetching the RSS feed.

timeout.info: Request timeout in seconds when fetching the RSS feed.

text_key.info: The key to use for the text field in the Data objects (e.g., 'title', 'summary', 'content').

success.fetched_entries: Successfully fetched {count} entries out of {total} total entries

errors.no_entries: No entries found in the RSS feed.
